[quote=“the bank, post:27, topic:232472”][quote author=moparscape4lifez link=topic=306590.msg2452215#msg2452215 date=1222019992]
I have no idea why you guys help out si force without any flame… and when I talk… you always flame… is it because I got moparscape in my name? what if I had zezima in my name and I was posing as him… would you talk shit as well… the only reason you made me into what I am now is from all the shit talking.

I got artistic skills yes im a pro at drawing… I played runescape 24\7 for 7 years now and well I decided to start programming to make my own sever
[/quote]Autistic. Not artistic you fucking twat.

If you had zezima in your name, then you would be just as fucking retarded. We help people who ask nicely. Not people who are fucking idiots, full of themselves, and obsessed with posting useless and retarded help which is complete garbage.

EDIT:

thats mis-spelled no such word exists… he miss-spelt it on purpose to keep my guessing (i hope this doesn’t make me look stupid)

what is acting? who cares how I act… I am a very serious man… and I came here to get some XP.

OHH EMMM GEEE

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autism[/quote]

Oh the irony.

en.wikipedia.org

Autism

Autism is a developmental disorder characterized by difficulties with social interaction and communication, and by restricted and repetitive behavior. Parents usually notice signs during the first two or three years of their child's life. These signs often develop gradually, though some children with autism reach their developmental milestones at a normal pace before worsening. Autism is associated with a combination of genetic and environmental factors. Risk factors during pregnancy includ...

item.title: Basic java error [Help] - Lock this, Solved
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Instead of Java Guru’s flaming people, why dont you just help them? Is it too hard to ask just to stop saying fuck. :mad:
Anyways, how do you do it then?

[quote=“io9, post:6, topic:232472”][quote author=Project Evolution link=topic=306590.msg2452148#msg2452148 date=1222017632]

The function is declared outside the class and it’s also missing the closing bracket.

Yes, you cant declare anything out of the class.

[code]class Bicycle {
// Basic functions
public static void main(string[] args) {

int speed = 0;
int gear = 1;

void changeSpeed(int newValue) {
speed = newValue;
}

void changeGear(int newValue) {
gear = newValue;
}

void applyBrakes(int decrement) {
speed = speed - decrement;
}

   void printStates() {
        System.out.println("speed:"+speed+" gear:"+gear);
   }

}
}[/code]
[/quote]
You can’t declare methods in a method either.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Basic java error [Help] - Lock this, Solved
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“moparscape4lifez, post:10, topic:232472”]LOL oh also or

void printStates() {printf(“states\n”);}
void applyBrakes(Object o) {}
applyBrackets(new printStates());

thats making a printStates method inside applyBrackets![/quote]

Only post here if you know what your doing,
I need help, Not an idiot posting random shit.

And also, Thanks io9, k00dr and supermagier,

I think i actually understand it now.

Read full topic
